import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaskList(_ref){let{tasks,fetchTasks}=_ref;const handleDelete=async id=>{try{await API.delete("/tasks/".concat(id));fetchTasks();}catch(err){console.error('❌ Error deleting task:',err);alert('Failed to delete task.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"task-list",children:tasks.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"no-task",children:"No tasks added yet."}):tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:task.text||task.title}),task.description&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:task.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-btn",onClick:()=>handleDelete(task._id),children:"Delete"})]},task._id))});}export default TaskList;
